import React from "react"; import "./Footer.css"; import { Button } from "./Button"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Footer() { return (
{/*

Join the Adventure newsletter to receive our best vacation deals

You can unsubscribe at any time.

*/}

About Us

ArtShala is a very new and creative platform for listing artworks of different artists and help their work to reach the art lovers. For as long as humanity has existed, art has been part of our lives. For many years, people have been creating and enjoying art. It expresses emotions or expression of life. It is one such creation that enables interpretation of any kind.
